thumb.name: Letter to Santa
thumb.verse: Whether you%26#146;re typing, word-processing or writing longhand the old-fashioned way, personalised %3CB%3Estationery%3C/B%3E is a nice way to express yourself and impress your correspondent.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CB%3EYou'll need:%3C/B%3E A4 Paper. Use plain white paper, coloured paper, or preprinted stationery stock.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CB%3EDirections:%3C/B%3E%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E1. Click on %3CB%3EPersonalise Your Project%3C/B%3E to open the Create %26 Print workspace. %3CBR%3E2. Personalise the text. Select the text to write over it or change size, colour and font style.%3CBR%3E3. For additional pages click %3Cb%3EAdd Page%3C/b%3E and follow the directions.%3CBR%3E4. Print your project.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CB%3ETips:%3C/B%3E%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3EChoose a stationery style that fits your mood %26#150; whimsical, happy, serious, etc.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3EFormal stationery traditionally includes the writer%26#146;s name and contact information but don%26#146;t feel restricted to that. Specially chosen pictures and quotations can make your stationery uniquely yours. %3CBR%3E%3CBR%3EMany stationery projects have coordinating envelopes, labels or stickers you can Create %26 Print as well. %3CBR%3E%3CBR%3EYou may want to save your favourite stationery so that you can make more. Click %3CB%3ESave%3C/B%3E and follow the directions.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E

thumb.name: Letter for Santa
thumb.verse: %3CB%3EEnvelopes%3C/B%3E are the first things a recipient sees when getting mail. So it%26#146;s worthwhile %26#150; and fun %26#150; to create, personalise and print envelopes to go with cards and letters.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CB%3EDirections:%3C/B%3E%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E1. Click on %3CB%3EPersonalise and Print Your Project%3C/B%3E to open the Create %26 Print workspace.%3CBR%3E2. Personalise the text. Select the text to write over it or change size, colour and font style.%3CBR%3E3. Click %3Cb%3EAdd Page%3C/b%3E for each additional envelope you want to create.%3CBR%3E4. Print your project.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CB%3ETips:%3C/B%3E%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3EEnvelopes can be used for mailing stationery, brochures, flyers, notes, greeting cards and more.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3EPrint your project on scrap paper first to check the alignment, spelling and overall look of the project.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E

thumb.name: Christmas Wish List
thumb.verse: Be sure Santa knows what you want for Christmas this year by creating a fun Wish List!%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CB%3EYou'll need:%3C/B%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E A4 Paper. %3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CB%3EDirections:%3C/B%3E%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3COL%3E%3CLI%3EClick on %3CB%3EPersonalise and PrintYour Project%3C/B%3E to open the Create %26 Print workspace. %3CBR%3E%3Cbr%3E%3CLI%3EPersonalise the text. Select the text to write over it or change size, colour and font style.%3Cbr%3E%3CBR%3E%3CLI%3EFor additional list pages. click %3Cb%3EAdd Page%3C/b%3E and follow the directions. %3CBR%3E%3Cbr%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3EPrint%3C/b%3E your project. %3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3C/OL%3E%3C/LI%3E%3CB%3ETips:%3C/B%3E%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3EPrint your project on scrap paper first to check the alignment, spelling and overall look of the project. %3Cbr%3E
